channel.title: Solace OSRS 317
channel.description:
[size=14pt][color=blue][center]Play Solace Now!![/center] [center][u][center][b][size=20pt]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/0q16wbdzapcv8wf/Solace.jar[/size][/b][/center]
[size=1.35em]We now have IRONMAN MODE[/size] [img]http://i65.tinypic.com/106bhow.png[/img]
[size=1.35em]More Players are coming everyday![/size] [img]http://i66.tinypic.com/dwfmdy.png[/img] [img]http://i66.tinypic.com/mt9mwx.png[/img]
[size=1.45em][b]Hello Everyone! We are the Solace Team![/b][/size]
We would like to start out by letting everyone know a little about our server. Our Server is a 2007 Old-school RSPS. The Solace Team has been working on the server for a little over 1 1/2 years working hard to improve and give the best content and we would like to welcome everyone to be apart of it with us. We are always open to suggestions. We are always active on forums posting updates, Vote Polls, ect. We take votes for any new updates that enter the game to make sure its to our players standards.
[size=1.45em][font=comic sans ms]OVER 11 Different [u]Bosses[/u][/font][/size] [size=1.45em][font=comic sans ms]Of course we have all of our lovely Boss Pets![/font][/size] [url=http://tinypic.com/r/2nsniio/9][size=1.45em]Short Boss Pet Video HERE[/size][/url] [img]http://i65.tinypic.com/1z9eo0.png[/img] [img]http://i63.tinypic.com/wmmsrs.png[/img] [img]http://i67.tinypic.com/rbk5qq.png[/img] [img]http://i68.tinypic.com/oqvwuf.png[/img] [img]http://i64.tinypic.com/2la3m0w.png[/img] [img]http://i63.tinypic.com/2pq0xvq.png[/img] [img]http://i63.tinypic.com/nlzjvd.png[/img]
[size=1.35em][font=comic sans ms]TONS of [u]Mini-Games[/u][/font][/size]
[img]http://i63.tinypic.com/24bnthx.png[/img]
[size=1.45em][font=comic sans ms]All Skills Working[/font][/size]
[img]http://i63.tinypic.com/119c6d0.png[/img]
[size=1.45em][font=comic sans ms]5 Different Pking Spots[/font][/size]
[img]http://i68.tinypic.com/102qrs3.png[/img]
[size=1.45em][font=comic sans ms]Shops + Thieving [/font][/size]
[img]http://i64.tinypic.com/2vah3yw.png[/img] [font=comic sans ms][size=1.45em] Monster Training Spots[/size][/font]
[img]http://i66.tinypic.com/2daxc01.png[/img]
[font=comic sans ms] [size=1.45em]Some items In-game[/size][/font] [img]http://i67.tinypic.com/10mkcn4.png[/img]
[font=comic sans ms][size=1.45em]Last but not least we have our Donator Zone :: dzone[/size][/font]
Donator- Able to make quick money with skilling, have access to close Woodcutting, Mining, Cooking & Training Gold Donator- Same as above but with access to a couple of thieving stalls 30k per thiev. Super Donator- Same as above but also with access to an altar that restores hit-points, prayer and spec you can also have the benefit of cahnging your title by doing ::title-name-color (Ex: ::title-King-Blue )
[img]http://i63.tinypic.com/196n8x.png[/img]
[i][size=2em][font=comic sans ms]Need to Contact Us? Here's How[/font][/size][/i]
Email: solaceteam@yahoo.com Forums: http://solaceforums.forumotion.com/forum] [size=18pt][b] **We are in the Process of a New Forums** :)[/b][/size] Until then, be sure to check our forums!!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OwuAc3Towck[/center]

item.title: Solace OSRS 317
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[size=14pt][color=blue][center]Play Solace Now!![/center]
[center][u][center][size=20pt]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/0q16wbdzapcv8wf/Solace.jar[/size][/center]

[size=1.35em]We now have IRONMAN MODE[/size]

106bhow.png762×529

[size=1.35em]More Players are coming everyday![/size]

dwfmdy.png763×522

mt9mwx.png1023×646

[size=1.45em]Hello Everyone! We are the Solace Team![/size]

We would like to start out by letting everyone know a little about our server. Our Server is a 2007 Old-school RSPS. The Solace Team has been working on the server for a little over 1 1/2 years working hard to improve and give the best content and we would like to welcome everyone to be apart of it with us. We are always open to suggestions. We are always active on forums posting updates, Vote Polls, ect. We take votes for any new updates that enter the game to make sure its to our players standards.

[size=1.45em][font=comic sans ms]OVER 11 Different Bosses[/font][/size]
[size=1.45em][font=comic sans ms]Of course we have all of our lovely Boss Pets![/font][/size]
[size=1.45em]Short Boss Pet Video HERE[/size]

[size=1.45em][font=comic sans ms]All Skills Working[/font][/size]

[size=1.45em][font=comic sans ms]5 Different Pking Spots[/font][/size]

[font=comic sans ms][size=1.45em]
Monster Training Spots[/size][/font]

2daxc01.png525×528

[font=comic sans ms]
[size=1.45em]Some items In-game[/size][/font]

[font=comic sans ms][size=1.45em]Last but not least we have our Donator Zone :: dzone[/size][/font]

Donator- Able to make quick money with skilling, have access to close Woodcutting, Mining, Cooking & Training
Gold Donator- Same as above but with access to a couple of thieving stalls 30k per thiev.
Super Donator- Same as above but also with access to an altar that restores hit-points, prayer and spec you can also have the benefit of cahnging your title by doing ::title-name-color (Ex: ::title-King-Blue )

196n8x.png530×528

[size=2em][font=comic sans ms]Need to Contact Us? Here’s How[/font][/size]

Email: solaceteam@yahoo.com
Forums: http://solaceforums.forumotion.com/forum]
[size=18pt]
We are in the Process of a New Forums [/size]
Until then, be sure to check our forums!!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OwuAc3Towck[/center]
